name: Guess Who? Fire Emblem: Three Houses Edition!
name_original: Guess Who? Fire Emblem: Three Houses Edition!
description:
Play Guess Who? but with all of your favorite Fire Emblem: Three Houses characters! Once you and your opponent both have the game open in your browsers, you can play Guess Who? just like you did when  you were little! 

Never played Guess Who? Here are the rules(as everything is self-enforced by the players):

Your object is to guess your opponent's Mystery Person by asking one yes or no question per turn, and eliminating any gameboard faces that don't fit the Mystery Person's description.

In the original, the younger player goes first. Do it however you please!

On your turn you may either as a question, or guess who the Mystery Person is.

Some examples for questions would be: "Do they have green eyes?" "Are they wearing an accessory?" "Do they have facial hair?" or even "Are they smiling?" Be creative with it! If you're familiar with FE:3H lore, you could even ask questions about that. :)

Whoever guesses their opponent's Mystery Person first wins! 

---

This weekend my friends and I did a game jam where we all did our own little projects! I don't fancy myself as much of a coder having only taken two classes in Python, but I thought that this seemed like just simple enough of an idea to accomplish in one weekend. I ended up learning javascript, which was very easy, actually :D I hope you like my little game! I had a lot of fun making all the portraits and coding!

I'm actually an artist! Here is my twitter if you're interested: https://twitter.com/radicalcattus
